ygData.subject: Re: Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: I am really depressed about EQ right now.  My partner almost since I began playing and in-game mate for most of my characters seems to have decided not to
ygData.messageBody:
I am really depressed about EQ right now. My partner almost since I
began playing and in-game mate for most of my characters seems to have
decided not to play. I wanted to settle onto Brell where I got involved
with a fun RPG guild. He decided, after umpteen changes of characters,
in retrospect we changed everytime I started making friends outside the
partnership, that he didn't want to play on Brell anymore, and wanted to
go back to our original couple.

Anyway, the loss has really taken its toll on my joy in EQ. I have
another sometime partner romantically for one of my new characters (he
plays my "sugar daddy") but now his RL is falling apart. *sigh*

My RL is TOTALLY stable, okay, so maybe that is why I look for a little
fun and romance in-game. But, this is so much like the old days of
dating. Anyway, I'm drifting between characters right now, mostly
thinking Necromancer is my all time favorite class. But as she was
formed with my partner, it's hard to separate them. Just before we
split, she had moved from apprentice to journeyman and he asked her to
marry him at her second naming.

Sorry to ramble on. Just needing someone to listen, I guess. I'm kind
of sad about it all. And confused.

Dnaisha on Brell

Draigen@... wrote:

> Hail & Well Met,
> I just joined the mailing list and I am looking forward to meeting all
> of you. It will be nice to have a place to discuss EQ with other
> addicted women :)
>
> Also I would like to send greetings to Luna... I found the board and
> look forward to speaking with you more about the Sisterhood of
> Erolissi.
>
> Good Travels & Safe Hunting Sisters,
> Marigold
